name: LD48 (Evan Binder)
description:
Updated LD48 project! (play original here password: pico)

Controls:

Arrow Keys - move center point

x - quadruple number of triangles

z/c - convert all tiles to quads

This is a base for a future weird-topology game project inspired by Oskar Stålberg.

Controls:

Arrow Keys - move center point

z/x/c - double number of triangles.

This is a base for a future weird-topology game project inspired by Oskar Stålberg.

Due to life events and also not knowing ld48 was happening until yesterday (and thinking the deadline was tomorrow), I estimate ~5 hours were spent on this. Pretty happy with the progress!
